Question.Subject: Which organizer do you like the best?
Question.Content:
From http://desktoporganizers.blogspot.com/, which organizer do you like the best?
Thanks (: Oh, let me try the link again. If this doesn't work type it in the URL and that should work.
http://desktoporganizers.blogspot.com/
Question.ChosenAnswer: I got "link not found" when trying to open your link. I can suggest good movie and book organizers only. All My Movies + All My Books works great for me. http://www.bolidesoft.com/allmymovies.html http://www.bolidesoft.com/allmybooks.html

Answer.Content: I got "link not found" when trying to open your link. I can suggest good movie and book organizers only. All My Movies + All My Books works great for me. http://www.bolidesoft.com/allmymovies.html http://www.bolidesoft.com/allmybooks.html
